5430.verse: يُرْسِلِ|He will send down|138|169|8539$ٱلسَّمَآءَ|(rain from) the sky|144|206|5426$عَلَيْكُم|upon you|81|143|416$مِّدْرَارًا|(in) abundance,|125|156|5427$

5431.verse: وَيُمْدِدْكُم|And provide you|127|134|17363$بِأَمْوَٲلٍ|with wealth|97|110|10231$وَبَنِينَ|and children,|105|118|10232$وَيَجْعَل|and make|88|101|12713$لَّكُمْ|for you|67|80|207$جَنَّـٰتٍ|gardens|75|88|241$وَيَجْعَل|and make|88|94|12713$لَّكُمْ|for you|67|334|207$أَنْهَـٰرًا|rivers.|75|342|13263$

5436.verse: وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|100|167$أَنۢبَتَكُم|has caused you to grow|180|219|17368$مِّنَ|from|50|89|156$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|131|100$نَبَاتًا|(as) a growth.|116|136|2806$

5437.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|66|293$يُعِيدُكُمْ|He will return you|136|162|17369$فِيهَا|into it|59|85|253$وَيُخْرِجُكُمْ|and bring you forth,|152|178|17370$إِخْرَاجًا|(a new) bringing forth.|170|183|17371$

5444.verse: مِّمَّا|Because of|93|99|216$خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ|their sins|107|120|17387$أُغْرِقُواْ|they were drowned,|153|166|17388$فَأُدْخِلُواْ|then made to enter|149|162|17389$نَارًا|(the) Fire,|88|101|140$فَلَمْ|and not|71|77|4026$يَجِدُواْ|they found|92|118|4142$لَهُم|for themselves|117|170|98$مِّن دُونِ|besides|101|154|224$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|106|2$أَنصَارًا|any helpers.|101|127|17390$

5446.verse: إِنَّكَ|Indeed, You,|105|121|340$إِن|if|44|76|225$تَذَرْهُمْ|You leave them|123|155|17393$يُضِلُّواْ|they will mislead|128|160|17394$عِبَادَكَ|Your slaves|96|128|9777$وَلَا|and not|71|87|25$يَلِدُوٓاْ|they will beget|118|168|17395$إِلَّا|except|65|166|86$فَاجِرًا|a wicked,|83|184|17396$كَفَّارًا|a disbeliever.|107|157|17397$

5447.verse: رَّبِّ|My Lord!|77|89|7$ٱغْفِرْ|Forgive|68|92|3353$لِى|me|46|70|1351$وَلِوَٲلِدَىَّ|and my parents,|128|152|9656$وَلِمَن|and whoever|105|129|9171$دَخَلَ|enters|64|88|2809$بَيْتِىَ|my house -|95|107|1147$مُؤْمِنًا|a believer|84|104|4309$وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ|and believing men|138|178|9657$وَٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ|and believing women.|162|202|7744$وَلَا|And (do) not|105|145|25$تَزِدِ|increase|75|95|17386$ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ|the wrongdoers|123|211|377$إِلَّا|except|65|240|86$تَبَارَۢا|(in) destruction.`|136|224|17398$

5430.verse: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

5431.verse: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

5432.verse: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

5433.verse: While He has created you in stages?

5434.verse: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

5435.verse: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

5436.verse: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

5437.verse: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

5438.verse: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

5439.verse: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "

5440.verse: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

5441.verse: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.

5442.verse: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.

5443.verse: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

5444.verse: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.

5445.verse: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

5446.verse: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

5447.verse: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."
